Safer For Kids

Our icecreams are safer beacause they are free from harmful glutens and are a rich source of vitamins,minerals and nutrients.

Ice Cream

Ice cream is made with milk, which is full of vitamins and nutrients like vitamin A, vitamin D, selenium, and zinc which are all vital for a healthy immune system.

Kulfi

Kulfi is denser and creamier than regular ice cream. It comes in various flavours. Traditional ones include cream (malai), rose, mango, cardamom (elaichi), saffron (kesar or zafran), and pistachio.

Cone Icecream

The cone is an important part of your ice cream experience. It provides additional texture to the dessert, as well as a light flavor to complement the strong, sweet flavors of ice cream devoured.

Lollies

An ice lolly, ice lollipop, or ice pop, is a frozen snack of flavoured ice. It is made by freezing flavoured liquid (such as fruit juice) or cream around a wooden stick.

Suitable for all ages

Ice-cream is often made very simply, with simple ingredients and processes.These ingredients are churned together and then frozen to particular temperatures.



Frequently Asked Questions


Our Ingredients

All of our products are 100% vegan, coconut-milk based, made with cane sugar, tapioca starch, coconut oil, and natural flavors and colors. Almost all of our ingredients are organic, and we are in the process of becoming certified organic. All of our ingredients and nutritional information can be found below on this website.

We produce in a shared facility that does handle common allergens and so we cannot guarantee there is no cross-contamination. We caution those with food allergies to consume our products at their own risk. We do not use any of the common food allergens in our products (dairy, gluten, soy, tree nuts, peanuts, eggs, sesame, corn) and we use good manufacturing practices, to minimize the risk of cross-contamination. This means that most of the equipment and wares we use are ours and not shared, however, we do use some wares that belong to the shared kitchen, and we cannot guarantee what else touches them. To prevent this we visually inspect and thoroughly wash, rinse, and sanitize everything we use before and after we use it. We understand that this isn’t an adequate countermeasure for some of our customers, and we are actively working on finding a facility free of allergens. But until then this is the best we believe we can do. If you have any suggestions on how to do it better, please share them with us.

Yes, there is both. Real fat (from coconut) and real sugar (organic cane). At this time, we have no intention of using alternatives. This is meant to be a tasty treat, enjoyed in moderation. It has similar fat/carb value to traditional ice cream. All nutritional info listed below.

We are 100% sure this is 100% vegan. The recipe took a lot of time to perfect. We’re committed to vegans and people with food allergies being able to get creamy, delicious ice cream in fun flavors.

Yes. While both ice cream and frozen dessert certainly contain milk/milk solids, the main difference between the two is in the source of fat. Frozen desserts use vegetable oil in place of milk fat, which actually makes Frozen Desserts responsibly delicious as it has much lower saturated fat content and is trans-fat free!

About Our Company

It’s a play on words. We are using a plant (coconut) to manufacture delicious ice cream/gelato/frozen dessert.

We have been vegan for many years and had a hard time finding creamy, delicious ice cream. Also, the non-dairy ice cream that did exist usually contained nuts or soy, and we knew a lot of people with food allergies who couldn’t eat them. In 2014, we made a coconut milk-based Superman ice cream for our son’s super hero themed 3rd birthday party, and people liked it! We did a lot of research and perfected the recipe, and in 2016, we started making vegan, allergy-friendly ice cream out of Eastern Market. No tummy trouble, just great Ice Cream for Everyone!
